name: Atroshity
description:
this is the game that will rock you upside and down side up okay? you have played games right? games where you shoot, games where you jump, even games where you can do both. but have you played a game quite like this my friend? i think the answer will be a big no from god himself and even from the second god (me hehehe). go ahead, sit down, grab your gamer drink and gamer son, and get ready to change your reality.


you know what? i'm not even done with my sales pitch here, this game is something the normal man can't even comprehend. it's as if the world (the entire time it existed) has been sweating and dreading the day this video game lands down with a mighty THUD. mother nature is quivering, are you?

HEY WATCH OUT: a lot of very bad words are in this game, if you don't like them, you gotta run away from this page...
